Description: Verify page loads correctly with all elements visible
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to portfolio URL 2. Wait for complete load 3. Verify all sections visible
Expected Result: Page loads within 3s with all elements visible

Test Steps: 1. Check browser tab title
Expected Result: Title shows "Ben Castillo - Full-Stack Developer"

Description: Test logo click returns to top
Test Steps: 1. Scroll down 2. Click BC logo 3. Verify smooth scroll to top
Expected Result: Smooth scroll to page top

Test Steps: 1. Click About in nav 2. Verify smooth scroll to About section
Expected Result: Smooth scroll to About section with active state

Test Steps: 1. Click Projects in nav 2. Verify smooth scroll to Projects section
Expected Result: Smooth scroll to Projects section with active state

Test Steps: 1. Click Contact in nav 2. Verify smooth scroll to Contact section
Expected Result: Smooth scroll to Contact section with active state

Description: Test automatic active state updates during scroll
Test Steps: 1. Scroll through page sections 2. Watch navigation active states
Expected Result: Active states update automatically based on scroll position

Test Steps: 1. Click moon icon 2. Verify color changes 3. Check localStorage
Expected Result: Dark mode activates with color changes and saves preference

Description: Test dark mode persists after page reload
Test Steps: 1. Refresh page 2. Verify dark mode remains active
Expected Result: Dark mode preference persists across page loads

Test Steps: 1. Click sun icon 2. Verify return to light colors 3. Check localStorage
Expected Result: Light mode restores with preference saved

Description: Test default filter state shows all projects
Test Steps: 1. Verify "All Projects" button active 2. Count visible project cards
Expected Result: All 6 project cards visible with "All Projects" active

Description: Test filtering to web applications only
Test Steps: 1. Click "Web Applications" button 2. Wait for animation 3. Count visible projects
Expected Result: Only 3 web application projects visible with smooth animation

Description: Test filtering to mobile apps only
Test Steps: 1. Click "Mobile Apps" button 2. Wait for animation 3. Count visible projects
Expected Result: Only 1 mobile app project visible with smooth animation

Description: Test filtering to data projects only
Test Steps: 1. Click "Data Projects" button 2. Wait for animation 3. Count visible projects
Expected Result: Only 2 data projects visible with smooth animation

Test Steps: 1. Rapidly click different filter buttons 2. Observe animations
Expected Result: Animations handle rapid clicking without glitches

Pre-conditions: Projects section visible with screen reader
Test Steps: 1. Activate filters 2. Listen for announcements
Expected Result: Screen reader announces filter changes and project counts

Description: Test successful form submission with valid data
Test Steps: 1. Fill valid name email message 2. Submit form 3. Verify success message
Expected Result: Form submits successfully with success message and auto-reset

Test Steps: 1. Leave name empty 2. Tab out or submit
Expected Result: Shows "Name is required" error with visual indicators

Test Steps: 1. Enter single character 2. Tab out
Expected Result: Shows minimum length error message

Test Steps: 1. Enter numbers/special chars 2. Tab out
Expected Result: Shows pattern validation error

Test Steps: 1. Leave email empty 2. Tab out or submit
Expected Result: Shows "Email is required" error

Test Steps: 1. Enter invalid email formats 2. Tab out
Expected Result: Shows email format error for invalid patterns

Test Steps: 1. Leave message empty 2. Submit form
Expected Result: Shows "Message is required" error

Test Steps: 1. Enter short message 2. Tab out
Expected Result: Shows minimum length error for messages under 10 chars

Description: Test form recovery from error states
Test Steps: 1. Create multiple errors 2. Fix one by one 3. Submit
Expected Result: Errors clear individually and form submits when all fixed

Test Steps: 1. Set viewport to 375px width 2. Check all sections
Expected Result: Single column layout with no horizontal scroll

Description: Test touch target sizes on mobile
Test Steps: 1. Measure interactive elements
Expected Result: All touch targets minimum 44px x 44px

Test Steps: 1. Set viewport to 768px width 2. Check grid layouts
Expected Result: Two-column project grid with proper spacing

Test Steps: 1. Set viewport to 1920px width 2. Check content width
Expected Result: Three-column project grid with centered content

Test Steps: 1. Rotate to landscape 2. Check layout adaptation
Expected Result: Layout adapts properly to landscape orientation

Test Steps: 1. Execute all core test scenarios
Expected Result: All features work correctly in Chrome

Test Steps: 1. Execute all core test scenarios
Expected Result: All features work correctly in Firefox

Test Steps: 1. Execute all core test scenarios
Expected Result: All features work correctly in Safari

Test Steps: 1. Execute all core test scenarios
Expected Result: All features work correctly in Edge

Test Steps: 1. Tab through all interactive elements
Expected Result: Logical tab order following visual layout

Test Steps: 1. Use Enter/Space on all interactive elements
Expected Result: All elements respond to keyboard activation

Test Steps: 1. Tab through elements 2. Verify focus visibility
Expected Result: Clear focus indicators visible on all elements

Test Steps: 1. Navigate by headings 2. Verify hierarchy
Expected Result: Logical heading hierarchy announced correctly

Test Steps: 1. Navigate by landmarks 2. Verify proper identification
Expected Result: Landmarks properly identified and navigable

Test Steps: 1. Navigate through form fields
Expected Result: All form fields properly labeled and announced

Test Steps: 1. Trigger project filters 2. Listen for announcements
Expected Result: Dynamic changes announced via live regions

Test Steps: 1. Check text contrast with tools
Expected Result: All text meets 4.5:1 contrast ratio

Test Steps: 1. Check large text contrast
Expected Result: Large text meets 3:1 contrast ratio

Test Steps: 1. Navigate and interact with page
Expected Result: Animations respect reduced motion preference

Test Steps: 1. Load page with network tools 2. Measure timing
Expected Result: Page loads in under 3 seconds on fast connection

Test Steps: 1. Run Lighthouse audit 2. Check performance score
Expected Result: Performance score 90 or higher

Test Steps: 1. Run Lighthouse audit 2. Check accessibility score
Expected Result: Accessibility score 100

Test Steps: 1. Measure LCP in DevTools
Expected Result: LCP under 2.5 seconds

Test Steps: 1. Interact and measure FID
Expected Result: FID under 100ms

Test Steps: 1. Monitor layout shifts during load
Expected Result: CLS under 0.1

Test Steps: 1. Navigate through entire site 2. Complete contact form
Expected Result: Smooth user experience with no friction points

Test Steps: 1. Attempt XSS injections in form fields
Expected Result: No script execution from user input

Test Steps: 1. Check meta tags in head
Expected Result: All required meta tags present and correct

Test Steps: 1. Navigate to /sitemap.xml
Expected Result: Sitemap loads and is well-formed

Test Steps: 1. Disable JavaScript 2. Load page
Expected Result: Basic content remains accessible without JavaScript
